statements: SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_age, customer_name FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, total_spent ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(total_spent) AS avg_spent FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING AVG(total_spent) > 500 ORDER BY avg_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, total_spent * 0.1 AS discount FROM customers ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT cluster_name, cluster_id FROM clusters;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT cluster_id, cluster_name FROM clusters WHERE cluster_id < 5 ORDER BY cluster_id;
SELECT customer_name, customers.customer_id, cluster_id FROM customers JOIN clusters ON customers.customer_id = clusters.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price < 100
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, cluster_label FROM customers JOIN clusters ON customers.customer_id = clusters.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT max(amount), min(amount) FROM transactions;
SELECT cluster_id, cluster_name FROM customer_clusters;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, address FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT c.name, t.amount, t.date FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT cluster_name, total_customers, avg_age, avg_transaction_amount FROM customer_clusters c JOIN cluster_stats s ON c.cluster_id = s.cluster_id WHERE s.avg_age > 35;

SELECT c1.cluster_id AS cluster1, c2.cluster_id AS cluster2, s.similarity_score FROM cluster_similarity s JOIN customer_clusters c1 ON s.cluster_id1 = c1.cluster_id JOIN customer_clusters c2 ON s.cluster_id2 = c2.cluster_id WHERE s.similarity_score > 0.6;
